column1: 59.  With  respect  to  Article  12(1)  of  the  Constitution,  I  see  no  necessity  to  engage  in  an

column2: exhaustive  discussion.  It  is  now  trite  law  that  Article  12(1)  encompasses  a  scope  that
extends well beyond the traditional notions of comparative equality and classification.20

column1: It  has  been  conceived  as  the  antithesis  of  arbitrariness.21
